titleStmt.title: Deathes generall proclamation also fine preceptes of vertuous and honest lyfe.
titleStmt.author: Leigh, Valentine, fl. 1562.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Sutton dwellyng in Pater noster row at the signe of the blacke boy,
publicationStmt.date: the 8 day of January, anno M.D.LXI [8 Jan. 1561]

notesStmt.note: Dedication begins: "To his very friend Master Henry Coddenham gent. Ualentine Leigh wyshesh health and prosperity."
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.

place.placeName: Pater noster row at the signe of the blacke boy
